Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.34502335]Virus:SARS-CoV-2 UC-1074:inhibition of virus activity in Vero cells(EC50≥17.6 ± 2.4 μM);SARS-CoV-2 UC-1075:inhibition of virus activity in Vero cells(EC50>20 μM);cytomegalovirus (HCMV) AD-169 Strain:inhibition of virus activity in human embryonic lung (HEL) cells(EC50>20 µM);cytomegalovirus (HCMV) Davis strain:inhibition of virus activity in human embryonic lung (HEL) cells(EC50>20 µM);varicella-zoster virus (VZV) TK+ VZV Strain OKA:inhibition of virus activity in human embryonic lung (HEL) cells(EC50=50.05 µM);varicella-zoster virus (VZV) TK-VZV Strain 07–1:inhibition of virus activity in human embryonic lung (HEL) cells(EC50=48.42 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry

Literature.Title: Peptide Derivatives of the Zonulin Inhibitor Larazotide (AT1001) as Potential Anti SARS-CoV-2 Molecular Modelling, Synthesis and Bioactivity Evaluation.
Literature.Author: Di Micco S, Musella S, Sala M, Scala MC, Andrei G, Snoeck R, Bifulco G, Campiglia P, Fasano A.
